attributes.title: Welp...
attributes.review: So, when i got the app i. had REALLY high hopes. but then everything went down hill just like when u was president. So this app it one of the worst app i have EVER downloaded and a complete WASTE OF MY TIME.😘❤️😁

attributes.title: deserves no stars 🤢
attributes.review: I would rate this app zero stars if I could. It doesn’t work! I suggest if you’re thinking about downloading, don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: ✨Terrible app✨
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy! I really wanted to support our president trump and after a week it tells me I can’t get into the app?!?!!?! I am definitely ✨deleting✨ this app

attributes.title: Tiktok 😊❤️ madilyn esqueda
attributes.review: It took a week to download  and I have to put in my number why dose the app want my number 🤢 when I opened the app I saw the worst the ever an ✨Orange✨🤢🤮 why would you ever download the add

attributes.title: This app has so many glitches
attributes.review: Do not proceed with this app. It has so much propaganda and endorsements on racism. It is such a fatal attribution to human kind. Stay away if you want change!

attributes.title: unnecessary
attributes.review: what president gets an app. what president had an unholy amount of merch. what president told their citizens to inject themselves w cleaning chemicals. what presidents uses the excuse of “i’m joking” every time he makes a dumb remark. ur not a comedian ur a president so act like it. he isn’t ur president, he should be ur enemy. he helps the top 10%, not the rest of us. take this app down he doesn’t need an app it’s so unnecessary.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app glitches so much! The first time I opened the app a picture of Donald Trump’s nudes popped up😳🖐. Absolutely disgusting! I also got a reminder to inject myself with chlorine to prevent me from getting corona!

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: An Absolutely horrible app. My heart goes out to anyone who downloaded it. As soon as I opened the app I saw a horrible bright orange creature. It was scary enough to give me nightmares for the rest of my life.

attributes.title: Problems with using
attributes.review: I had a very hard time using this app. Not useful and not user friendly

attributes.title: Buggy
attributes.review: Logging in, it wouldn’t even send me my sms till 10 mins after and keeps crashing on my aunt’s phone.
